Actions.ActionName: FOR EACH:  Repeat Process for Each Folder Selected in Finder

Actions.Title: Confirm Zip & TRASH of Folder
Actions.Prompt:
Folder (& All Sub-Folders) To be Zipped, and then Moved to TRASH:  
%Variable%ZIP__Folder%

This Folder will be MOVED TO TRASH, only if the Zip is successful, and its integrity was verified.

If the Zip File already exists, it will be OVERWRITTEN.
.

Actions.ActionName: SCRIPT:  Execute zip command with Integrity Check (SS Bash)

ElseActions.ActionName: SET Clipboard to Script Error Report
ElseActions.Text:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>>> ERROR <<<
 %ICUDateTime%yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm a%

Zip of Folder FAILED:	
Folder:	%Variable%ZIP__Folder%
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The zip file either was not created, or lacks integrity.
The SOURCE Folder was NOT moved to Trash.

This Report from the Zip Command Has Been Placed on the Clipboard
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

%Variable%ZIP__ScriptResults%

ThenActions.ActionName: SET Clipboard to Report of Results
ThenActions.Text:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zip & TRASH of Folder Completed:	 %ICUDateTime%yyyy-MM-dd  hh:mm a%
Folder:	>>> %Variable%ZIP__BaseName% <<<
Path:	%Variable%ZIP__Folder%
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zip File:  %Variable%ZIP__ParentPath%/%Variable%ZIP__BaseName%.zip
Zip INTEGIRY was confirmed.

This Report from the Zip Command Has Been Placed on the Clipboard
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

%Variable%ZIP__ScriptResults%
ThenActions.StyledText:

Actions.ActionName: SCRIPT:  DELETE All Variables with KMVarPrefix and in KMVars_To_Delete
Actions.Text:
tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
	
	--- DELETE ALL KM VARIABLES WITH THIS PREFIX ---
	
	set prefixStr to getvariable "KMVarPrefix"
	
	if (prefixStr ≠ "") then
		set value of variables whose name starts with prefixStr to "%Delete%"
		--display notification "All KM Variables with PREFIX = '" & prefixStr & ¬
		--	"' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script"
	end if
	
	--- DELETE KM VARS IN THE VARIABLE "KMVars_To_Delete" ---
	
	set varsToDeleteList to paragraphs of (getvariable "KMVars_To_Delete")
	
	if (varsToDeleteList ≠ {}) then
		
		set varsToDeleteList to varsToDeleteList & {"KMVars_To_Delete"}
		
		repeat with oVar in varsToDeleteList
			setvariable (oVar as text) to "%Delete%"
		end repeat
		
		--display notification "All KM Variables in 'KMVars_To_Delete' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script"
		
	end if
	
end tell
